entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
